001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.core;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Numbers;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Boundable;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Raycast;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.TaskContext;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
008import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
009
010import java.util.function.Predicate;
011
012public abstract class Projectile<B extends Boundable, F extends Projectile.Fluid<B>> {
013    public static final double
014        GRAVITY = 9.81,
015        EPSILON = 0.001;
016
017    public interface Fluid<B> {
018        double density();
019        boolean isOf(B hit);
020    }
021
022    protected final Raycast<B> raycast;
023    protected Vector3 position;
024    protected Vector3 velocity;
025    protected double gravity;
026
027    protected F fluid;
028    protected double speed = -1;
029    protected Vector3 direction;
030    protected double travelled;
031
032    public Projectile(Raycast<B> raycast, Vector3 position, Vector3 velocity, double gravity, F fluid) {
033        this.raycast = raycast;
034        this.position = position;
035        this.velocity = velocity;
036        this.gravity = gravity;
037        this.fluid = fluid;
038    }
039
040    public Raycast<B> raycast() { return raycast; }
041
042    public Vector3 position() { return position; }
043    public void position(Vector3 position) { this.position = position; }
044
045    public Vector3 velocity() { return velocity; }
046    public void velocity(Vector3 velocity) { this.velocity = velocity; }
047
048    public double gravity() { return gravity; }
049    public void gravity(double gravity) { this.gravity = gravity; }
050
051    public F fluid() { return fluid; }
052    public double speed() { return speed; }
053    public Vector3 direction() { return direction; }
054    public double travelled() { return travelled; }
055
056    public void tick(TaskContext ctx) {
057        for (double sec = ctx.delta() / 1000d; sec > EPSILON; sec = step(ctx, sec)) {
058            if (ctx.cancelled()) {
059                removed(ctx);
060                return;
061            }
062        }
063    }
064
065    protected abstract Predicate<B> castTest();
066    protected abstract @Nullable F fluidOf(Raycast.Result<B> ray, Raycast.Hit<B> hit);
067
068    protected abstract double dragCoeff();
069    protected abstract double dragArea();
070    protected abstract double mass();
071
072    protected double step(TaskContext ctx, double sec) {
073        velocity = velocity.y(velocity.y() - gravity * sec);
074        speed = velocity.length();
075        if (speed == 0) {
076            direction = Vector3.ZERO;
077            return 0;
078        }
079        direction = velocity.divide(speed);
080
081        double maxDistance = speed * sec;
082        var ray = raycast.cast(position, direction, maxDistance, bnd -> !fluid.isOf(bnd) && castTest().test(bnd));
083        var hit = ray.hit();
084        F oldFluid = fluid;
085        double penetrate;
086        if (hit == null) {
087            System.out.printf("(miss, dst = %.3f)\n", ray.distance());
088            penetrate = miss(ctx, sec, maxDistance, ray);
089        } else {
090            System.out.printf("hit: %s\n", ""+hit);
091            F newFluid = fluidOf(ray, hit);
092            penetrate = newFluid == null
093                ? collided(ctx, sec, maxDistance, ray, hit)
094                : changeFluid(ctx, sec, maxDistance, ray, hit, fluid, newFluid);
095        }
096
097        speed = Math.max(0, speed - dragCoeff() * fluid.density() * speed * speed * 0.5 * dragArea());
098        return sec * Numbers.clamp01(1 - penetrate / maxDistance);
099    }
100
101    protected void removed(TaskContext ctx) {}
102
103    protected double miss(TaskContext ctx, double sec, double maxDistance, Raycast.Result<B> ray) {
104        double penetrate = ray.distance();
105        travelled += penetrate;
106        position = position.add(direction.multiply(penetrate));
107        return penetrate;
108    }
109
110    protected double collided(TaskContext ctx, double sec, double maxDistance, Raycast.Result<B> ray, Raycast.Hit<B> hit) {
111        position = hit.out();
112        if (ray.distance() > 0) {
113            // start outside the bound
114            double penetrate = ray.distance();
115            travelled += penetrate + hit.penetration();
116            position = hit.out();
117            return penetrate;
118        } else {
119            // start inside the bound
120            double penetrate = hit.distOut();
121            travelled += penetrate;
122            return penetrate;
123        }
124    }
125
126    protected double changeFluid(TaskContext ctx, double sec, double maxDistance, Raycast.Result<B> ray, Raycast.Hit<B> hit, F oldFluid, F newFluid) {
127        double penetrate = ray.distance() > 0 ? ray.distance() + EPSILON : hit.distOut();
128        fluid = newFluid;
129        travelled += penetrate;
130        position = ray.pos().add(direction.multiply(EPSILON));
131        return penetrate;
132    }
133
134    /*protected abstract Predicate<B> castTest();
135    protected abstract F mediumOf(Raycast.Result<B> ray, Raycast.Hit<B> hit);
136
137    protected double step(TaskContext ctx, double remaining) {
138        Vector3 epsilon = direction.multiply(EPSILON);
139        double friction = medium.friction() * speed;
140        //double distance = speed * friction * remaining;
141        double distance = Math.max(0, (speed - (friction * remaining)) * remaining);
142        if (distance <= 0) {
143            velocity = Vector3.ZERO;
144            return 0;
145        }
146
147        System.out.printf("%.3f * %.3f * %.3f\n", speed, friction, remaining);
148        var ray = raycast.cast(position, direction, distance, b -> !medium.isOf(b) && castTest().test(b));
149        var hit = ray.hit();
150        F oldMedium = medium;
151        double penetrated;
152        if (hit == null) {
153            // this ray penetrated the full distance of our current medium
154            penetrated = ray.distance();
155        } else {
156            F newMedium = mediumOf(ray, hit);
157            var atomicDir = new AtomicReference<>(direction);
158            if (changeMedium(new StepContext(ctx, direction, speed, epsilon, atomicDir::set), ray, hit, ray.pos(), oldMedium, newMedium)) {
159                medium = newMedium;
160                if (ray.distance() > 0) {
161                    // ray started outside the bound
162                    // move it inwards by the epsilon so, on the next step, it is inside the bound
163                    penetrated = ray.distance() + EPSILON;
164                } else {
165                    // ray started inside the bound
166                    // so we manually move the pos forward
167                    // use distOut here rather than negative rayDist, since it avoids weird large gaps
168                    penetrated = hit.distOut();
169                }
170            } else {
171                // else we didn't change medium, so we assume our implementation handles it
172                penetrated = 0;
173            }
174            direction = atomicDir.get();
175        }
176
177        double d = speed;
178        speed = Math.max(EPSILON, speed - friction * remaining * penetrated);
179        velocity = direction.multiply(speed);
180        System.out.printf("%.3f -> %.3f (med = %s, fric = %.3f, rem = %.3f, pen = %.3f)\n", d, speed, medium, friction, remaining, penetrated);
181        travelled += penetrated;
182        position = position.add(direction.multiply(penetrated));
183        remaining *= 1 - penetrated / distance;
184        return remaining > EPSILON ? remaining : 0;
185    }
186
187    public void tick(TaskContext ctx) {
188        double sec = ctx.delta() / 1000d;
189        velocity = velocity.y(velocity.y() - gravity * sec);
190        double sqrSpeed = velocity.sqrLength();
191        if (sqrSpeed <= 0)
192            return;
193        speed = Math.sqrt(sqrSpeed);
194        direction = velocity.divide(speed);
195
196        tick0(ctx, sec);
197    }
198
199    protected void tick0(TaskContext ctx, double sec) {
200        for (double remaining = sec; remaining > EPSILON; remaining = step(ctx, remaining)) {
201            if (ctx.cancelled()) {
202                removed(ctx);
203                break;
204            }
205            direction = velocity.divide(speed);
206        }
207    }
208
209    public record StepContext(
210        TaskContext task, Vector3 direction, double speed, Vector3 epsilon,
211        Consumer<Vector3> setDirection
212    ) {
213        public void direction(Vector3 direction) {
214            setDirection.accept(direction);
215        }
216    }
217
218    protected boolean changeMedium(StepContext ctx, Raycast.Result<B> ray, Raycast.Hit<B> hit, Vector3 position, F oldMedium, F newMedium) {
219        return true;
220    }
221
222    protected void removed(TaskContext ctx) {}
223
224    protected void deflect(Vector3 direction, Vector3 normal, double power) {
225        position = position.subtract(direction.multiply(EPSILON));
226        velocity = Vector3.reflect(velocity, normal).multiply(power);
227    }
228
229    protected void penetrate(Vector3 direction, Vector3 out, double penetration) {
230        position = out.add(direction.multiply(EPSILON));
231        travelled += penetration + EPSILON;
232    }*/
233}
